title: Client/Servers Bugged/Broken
body:
Client continually crashing. Started 30 minutes ago. Can not load summoner profile. Post lobby never loads. And Client is throwing various "Unknown Errors", continually. Not just happening for me, also occurring on two of my friends.

Edit: Can not join ranked Q games. And friends list creates errors.

replies.body: We're all having the same issues, sit back and wait for them to be fixed!
Nah man, I couldn't of figured that out myself! I am just simply notifying RITO.

> [{quoted}](name=TnK,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=XGA2lEQX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-06T15:16:40.298+0000)
>
> Nah man, I couldn't of figured that out myself! I am just simply notifying RITO.

I think 3 posts is more then enough to "Notify RITO" Don't you think? :)
They were made whilst I was making mine. When I started there were none.... ......... {{summoner:3}}
Probably due to the fact the forums are also lagging behind.
